markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sense for Trouble](/Feats.aspx?ID=2325) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1253)

</column>

---

You can tell when something's off. You can trigger Cat's Luck after you roll initiative, in addition to its normal trigger, to reroll your Initiative and take the higher of the two results. This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.
name: Sense for Trouble

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Sense for Trouble Source Ancestry Guide pg. 19 2.0 Prerequisites Cat's Luck --- You can tell when something's off. You can trigger Cat's Luck after you roll initiative, in addition to its normal trigger, to reroll your Initiative and take the higher of the two results. This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.
